abstract: Repeats on Fox lifted the network to No. 1 in the ratings on Monday, as “House” at 9 p.m. attracted the night’s largest audience, 9.4 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
snippet: Repeats on Fox lifted the network to No. 1 in the ratings on Monday, as “House” at 9 p.m. attracted the night’s largest audience, 9.4 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: Repeats on Fox lifted the network to No. 1 in the ratings on Monday, as “House” at 9 p.m. attracted the night’s largest audience, 9.4 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates. While Fox’s “Bones” was the most watched show during the 8 p.m. hour with 6.7 million viewers, it trailed in its time slot among adults 18 to 49.

headline.main: Even With Repeats, Fox Leads the Pack
